modName: Requiem - No Healing Aura Persistent FX
summary: Removes the "bubble" effects from healing aura, and stops npcs from commenting about it.
descriptionHtml:
Intended to be used with the no glowing edges mod Ftreach: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34981/

My mod removes the "bubble" effect that the healing aura has. It also stops npcs from commenting on your colorful magical status. This doesn't apply to target healing auras, since you have no way of knowing when they run out. If somebody wants me to add it to target spells I might add another version.
author: Flazz
